title: Billy: Messenger of Powers
description: Dragons, unicorns, rock giants, and high school bullies...These are what make up everyday life in the world of Billy Jones: a boy who discovers a mysterious world where Powers (you or I would call them "wizards" - those talented few who use magic to shape the Elements) walk unknown among us.Now, Billy has found himself thrust into this world, and will have to discover if he, too, is a Power.And more than that, if he is The Messenger... the one foretold who will herald the return of the White King.But he and his friends must hurry, for the Darksiders are on the rise, the magical Truce between good and evil is at the breaking point, and all humanity is at stake.IS Billy The Messenger?
author: Michaelbrent Collings
